subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*krim||custom, prohibition}}. Compare {{cog|bo|ཁྲིམས||law, rule; habit}}, {{cog|lus|hrem||to punish}} and {{cog|sit-jap|khrɯm||punishment}}, although the latter may be a borrowed from Tibetan ({{zh-ref|Jacques, 2015}}; {{zh-ref|Jacques, 2004: 89)}}.

{{zh-ref|Schessler (2007)}} also adds {{cog|my|ခြိမ်||to threaten}} to the list of the possible cognates, however this word likely belongs to {{cog|sit-pro|*m-krim||to threaten}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[prohibit]]; to [[forbid]]; to [[restrict]]
# to [[pin down]]; to [[restrain]]
# to [[block]]; to [[hinder]]
# to [[imprison]]; to [[detain]]; to take into [[custody]]
# to [[use]] [[incantation]]
# to [[store]] up; to [[hoard]]
# [[ban]]; [[prohibition]]; [[restriction]]; [[interdict]]
# [[taboo]]; [[banned]] [[item]] or [[thing]]
# [[prison]]; [[jail]]; [[confinement]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[court]]; [[palace]]
# [[sorcery]]; [[incantation]]; [[spell]]
